name: Stress Point System - DnD 5e
description:
This Stress Point System can be used alone, but also are used alongside several mechanics. This gives a base mechanic for stress with increasing points (up to 5) and what happens when you hit those points. Highly customizable in what causes stress for your character. Also includes ways to decrease stress, which is easily tailored to your character. 

Screenreader accessible English pdf, French translation included.
